props.tag: Replaces html with provided value. This is useful for semantics and also to allow for valid markup in some cases (`ul > li` and `tr > td` etc.).

props.autofocus: Focus on first form-component <!-- TODO Add link --> on render

methods.validate: Performs validation and updates error state for each form component. Works with nested forms.
methods.focus: Focus on first focusable form-component in the form.
methods.focusInvalid: Focus on first focusable invalid form-component in the form. This is useful for longer forms and allows to bring user attention to invalid field.
methods.resetValidation: Reset validation for all validateable <!-- TODO Add link --> form-components.
methods.reset: Reset values and validation state for all form-components
